text: Furuset Forum is a sports arena in Oslo, Norway. The seating capacity of the arena is 1,498 people. It was built in 1979.Norwegian ice hockey venues at hockey.no The main sport played on it is ice hockey. It is also used by other sports for training and events. These include handball and floorball. It is near the metro which makes it popular and easy to get to.Official Sports Forum Website The arena has disabled parking spots, food and drink facilities. It is the home of the Furuset ice hockey team. ==References== Category:Sport in Norway Category:Buildings and structures in Norway Category:Stadiums in Europe Category:Oslo Category:1979 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Norway
title: Furuset Forum
